title: Questions asked of a tailor
context: Ask a tailor how much it costs to alter a piece of clothing.

content.bestLine: How much would it cost to alter this?

neutral.text: Can you tell me the cost?
What's the price for altering this?
Can I get a quote for alterations?
How much will it cost to fix this?
Can you alter this and how much?

informal.text: How much to fix this up?
Can you give me a deal on alterations?
How much to make it fit?
What'll it cost to get this altered?
Can you hook me up with a good price?
How much for a quick fix?
Give me a ballpark figure, okay?

formal.text: Could you please provide the alteration cost?
I would appreciate it if you could quote me a price.
What is your standard alteration fee?
Could you inform me about the cost of alterations?
I am interested in knowing the price for altering this item.
Would you be so kind as to provide a quote for the alterations?

patterns.meaning: Asking for the cost of a specific alteration service
Requesting the tailor to provide the cost of alterations

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hi, I'd like to get this dress altered. How much would it cost?

lines.speaker: Tailor
lines.text: Let me take a look. The alteration fee would be around $20 to $30 depending on the work needed.

dialogs.description: Customer negotiating the price of alterations

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: That sounds a bit high. Can you give me a better price?

lines.speaker: Tailor
lines.text: I can offer you a discount. How about $15 to $25?
